notes: MongoDB-compatible API; Steps: 1) Create cluster 2) Connect via CloudShell 3) Insert data 4) Query data
NoSQL API; Steps: 1) Create table 2) Add items 3) Query items

Multi-API gateway (SQL/MongoDB/Cassandra/Gremlin/Table); Steps: 1) Create account 2) Create database 3) Query via chosen API
NoSQL document API; Steps: 1) Create project 2) Initialize Firestore 3) Add and read data
SQL API; Steps: 1) Create instance 2) Create database 3) Connect 4) Query
MongoDB API; Steps: 1) Create cluster 2) Create user 3) Connect 4) Insert and query
Multi-API (CQL/Document/GraphQL); Steps: 1) Create database 2) Choose API 3) Connect and query
Cypher API; Steps: 1) Create database 2) Connect via Browser 3) Run Cypher queries
Multi-API (Search/SQL/Vector); Steps: 1) Create deployment 2) Connect to Kibana 3) Index data 4) Search/query
MySQL-compatible API; Steps: 1) Create database 2) Create branch 3) Connect 4) Create schema 5) Query
PostgreSQL API with REST; Steps: 1) Create project 2) Create table 3) Insert and query via SQL or REST
FQL API; Steps: 1) Create database 2) Create collection 3) Create document 4) Query with FQL
Redis API; Steps: 1) Create database 2) Connect via CLI/client 3) Set/get key-value pairs
PostgreSQL-compatible API; Steps: 1) Create cluster 2) Create user 3) Connect 4) Create table and query
